Get classification from a deployment using the provided input.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Provide your input for classification","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"model":{"type":"string","example":"Llama-3.2-1B-Instruct"},"input":{"type":"string","example":"category1 related text","description":"The input for which to get classification"}},"required":["model","input"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful operation","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"rq-12345","description":"The unique identifier for the classification"},"response":{"type":"object","description":"The predicted classification percentages","properties":{"category1":{"type":"number","format":"float","example":0.9453125},"category2":{"type":"number","format":"float","example":0.01875},"category3":{"type":"number","format":"float","example":0.0859375},"category4":{"type":"number","format":"float","example":0.015625}}}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid Input error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["status","error"],"properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":400},"error":{"type":"string","example":"Bad request"}},"title":"ApiErrorInvalidInput"}}}},"404":{"description":"Not Found error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["status","error","code"],"properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":404},"error":{"type":"string","example":"Not found"},"code":{"type":"string","example":"object_not_found"}},"title":"ApiErrorNotFound"}}}}}}
>
